page.title: 10EASTBOROUGH FIRST SCHOOL
page.content: I get up at six o'clock in the morning and I go downstairs and I wash my face and my hands.Then I get dressed and have my breakfast,things like cornflakes and tea, then comb my hair and I set off for the school. I walk to school and I come with Njabid.I get in the playground and I find Akmal and we play marbles.I play with Akmal and Iftikhar.We play for five minutes then we go for our dinners.We eat things like fish, chips and beans.Me,Iftikhar and Akmal go outside and play marbles until the bell goes,and then we line up. I go to the Mosque at 4 o'clock and I pray there until our master comes and he listens to us. If I don't know some words our master says remember next time, then we go home. I play outside until 8 o'clock and I go to bed at 9 o'clock.
